scripts.test:medium:wrangler: npm run test:fast:wrangler && TEST_TARGET=wrangler vitest run tests/proxy-test-end2end-w3c-validation.test.js --pool=forks
scripts.test:slow:wrangler: npm run test:fast:wrangler && TEST_TARGET=wrangler E2E_FULL_SUITE=true vitest run tests/proxy-test-end2end-w3c-validation.test.js --pool=forks
scripts.test:medium:node: npm run test:fast:node && TEST_TARGET=node vitest run tests/proxy-test-end2end-w3c-validation.test.js --pool=forks
scripts.test:slow:node: npm run test:fast:node && TEST_TARGET=node E2E_FULL_SUITE=true vitest run tests/proxy-test-end2end-w3c-validation.test.js --pool=forks
